channel.title: [PI] Portfowarded correctly but others cant connect HELP
channel.description:
Id just like to say this is not my client im part of the team,,,
Iv been trying to host the server on a no-ip but when the team try and log on they get the "Error connecting to server"
Ive tried changing it to 127.0.0.1 for the host, and no-ip for the team but to no avail.
If anyone could help that would be appreciated i have teamviewer also.
*EDIT* There is a Air Port Express connected to the router as a seperate wireless connection - [do i need Port Triggering?(2 wireless connections)] The Airport is connected via Ethernet
